title: Mystery gift not received but you took my brothers money... :(
body: Recently I was mystery gifted Eternum Rek'Sai by my brother but still haven't received it. I witnessed it go though on his account but when I logged into my account i did not receive anything but the Riot Points were still taken from his account. Any idea what's going on here?  Perhaps it's taking a while for it to register? I don't know?? please help.

replies.body:
Are you both on the same region? Are you 100% sure that it was to the correct account? Did you screenshot it?

If all of these are fine, then send in a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and they will instruct you on what to do.
